A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: was ok but was a little underwhelmed by it all. loved force awakens just flowed. last Jedi just seemed to be flashbacks. a supreme leader a troubled apprentice an over reliance on fluffy creatures. a revel alliance that is on its knees yet again yoda seemed to be a little flat I'm sorry to say but with all respect Carrie Fisher is not the best actress she just seems a little to rigid to me.  the casino was pointless to me not enough of max a very important character in the first film.\nI'm sorry but one x wing fighter doing that at the start is a bit over the top. in the force awakens they manage to hit the tie fighter but not an x wing it all just seemed to be to much.
